itemDescription: Welsh rugby union footballer and coach, and rugby league footballer

wikipedia_page.main: Adrian O. Cambriani (birth registered first ¼ 1962) is a Welsh former rugby union, and professional rugby league footballer who played in the 1980s, and coached rugby union in the 2000s. He played club level rugby union (RU) for Swansea RFC, and representative level rugby league (RL) for Wales, and at club level for Fulham RLFC and Hull FC, as a wing, i.e. number 2 or 5, and coached club level rugby union (RU) for Penlan RFC.
